scripts.preinstall: gem install --user-install --bindir ~/bin --no-document --pre --verbose jekyll && npm install -g bower && bower update
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run copy && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs src/js/**/*.js --beautify -o dist/js/yoi.js && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.build-styles: lessc src/less/index.less dist/css/yoi.css --source-map-map-inline && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/css/yoi.css -o dist/css/yoi.css && npm run copy-styles
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-docs
scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/audio dist/css dist/img dist/js
scripts.clean-docs: rm -rf docs/_site && mkdir docs/_site && rm -rf docs/assets && mkdir docs/assets && mkdir docs/assets/audio docs/assets/css docs/assets/js
scripts.copy: npm run copy-audio && npm run copy-favicon && npm run copy-scripts && npm run copy-styles
scripts.copy-audio: cp src/audio/* dist/audio/ && cp dist/audio/* docs/assets/audio/
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run deploy-scripts && npm run deploy-styles && npm run compress-styles && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-favicon && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.deploy-styles: lessc src/less/index.less dist/css/yoi.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/css/yoi.css -o dist/css/yoi.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-jekyll & npm run watch-scripts
scripts.watch-jekyll: chokidar 'docs/assets' 'docs/index.md' 'docs/_includes/' 'docs/_layouts/' 'docs/_pages/' -c 'cd docs && npm run build-jekyll && browser-sync reload'
